Package edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview

Class TreeTransitionView

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview.TreeElementView
edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview.TreeTransitionView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
public class TreeTransitionView extends TreeElementView
TreeTransitionView is a visual representation of a tree transition in the tree view. It extends TreeElementView and displays a transition arrow between tree nodes and handles various visual states such as selection, hover, and correctness.

  • Field Summary

    • getPathIterator

      public PathIterator getPathIterator(AffineTransform at)
      Returns an iterator over the path geometry of this TreeTransitionView. The iterator provides access to the path's segments and their coordinates, which can be used for rendering or hit testing.
      Parameters:
      at - the AffineTransform to apply to the path geometry
      Returns:
      a PathIterator that iterates over the path geometry of this TreeTransitionView

    • getPathIterator

      public PathIterator getPathIterator(AffineTransform at, double flatness)
      Returns an iterator over the path geometry of this TreeTransitionView with the specified flatness. The iterator provides access to the path's segments and their coordinates, which can be used for rendering or hit testing.
      Parameters:
      at - the AffineTransform to apply to the path geometry
      flatness - the maximum distance that the line segments can deviate from the true path
      Returns:
      a PathIterator that iterates over the path geometry of this TreeTransitionView
